content: मुद्रा [मुद्-रक्] {@--1@} A seal, an instrument for sealing or stamping; especially a seal-ring, signet-ring; अनया मुद्रया मुद्रयैनं <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; नाममुद्राक्षराण्यनुवाच्य परस्परमवलोकयतः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); इति प्रायो भावाः स्फुरदवधिमुद्रामुकुलिताः <ls>Bh. 2. 114.</ls> {@--2@} A stamp, print, mark, impression; चतुःसमुद्रमुद्रः <ls>K. 191</ls>; सिंदूरमुद्रांकितः (बाहुः) <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> {@--3@} A pass, pass-port (as given by a seal-ring); अगृहीतमुद्रः कटकानिष्क्रामसि <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; गृहीतभुद्रः सलेखः पुरुषो गृहीतः <ls>Mu. 5.</ls> {@--4@} A stamped coin, coin, piece of money. {@--5@} A medal. {@--6@} An image, a sign, badge, token. {@--7@} Shutting, closing, sealing; सैवौष्ठमुद्रा स च कर्णपाशः <ls>U. 6. 27</ls>; क्षिपन्निद्रामुद्रां मदनकलहच्छेदसुलभां <ls>Māl. 2. 12</ls> ‘removing the seal of sleep’ &c. {@--8@} A mystery. {@--9@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) The expression of things by their right names. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of certain positions of the fingers practised in devotion or religious worship.
